Name: Where Starry Seas Endure II
Description: Harriet seems troubled by something. Speak with her and learn what it's about.
QuestDesc: Harriet seems troubled by something. Speak with her and learn what it's about.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Harriet, what's wrong? You don't look well.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, it's you. I... am fine. It's just that...

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Sanna hasn't replied to my messages for days.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard from the crew at the Starward Riseway that the blizzards and Void Storms out in the frostlands have been terrible lately...

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you can, could you please go there again and ask for more information for me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've already gone a few times... and I still have work to finish at the Spacetrek Observatory...

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Among the crowd at the station, you find a group of researchers dusting snow from their protective suits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tired-looking Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What is it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Tired-looking Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Sanna? Did Harriet ask you to come?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know her?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha. I'm Jasper. Harriet might've mentioned me.

Options.PlotLineKey: She said you were her senior.
She said Sanna went to the frostlands with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh… Yeah. They actually met through a research project I led a while back.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where is Sanna?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She's not coming back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, not what you're thinking. She didn't have an accident out there. It's worse than that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He lets out a heavy sigh.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sanna... is a very lively and adventurous Roya girl. Clever with her hands, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for Harriet, you've met her too. She's very dependent on Sanna, and Sanna is good to her, but... I think they want different things.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sanna craves change and thrill. And Harriet… she needs something steady.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: During this Exoswarm expedition, the Institute made some real breakthroughs. We found several rare Exoswarm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But then, when nobody was expecting it… Sanna colluded with outside poachers. She helped them smuggle the Exoswarm out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …I chased after them. Only caught their trail as they were leaving. Sanna shouted back to me through the snow, saying she was going to see the stars somewhere else. Told me to tell Harriet that she was a bad person.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I couldn't tell if the look on her face was excitement or misery. The snow was too thick… I just couldn't see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should've shot to stop them, but I hesitated and missed my chance. The blizzard covered their tracks not long after.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...That's the whole story. Whether you want to tell Harriet or not is up to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why don't you tell her yourself? You're a respected senior to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because I don't know if Harriet actually wants to hear this. Maybe she'd be happier thinking Sanna's still out there roaming the frostlands.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I already misjudged Sanna's character. I let my emotions get in the way when I should've fired. I'm too close to this to see clearly, and I don't want to make a third mistake.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jasper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Ugh, I need a drink. As for Harriet, I'll leave her to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're back. Um... got any news about Sanna?

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. So Sanna... she left.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's okay... I'm just a little confused.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Actually, I know that Sanna has always wanted to leave Lahai-Roi and see the world. She even asked me to go with her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I always felt that... it was too dangerous.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Life as a researcher in Lahai-Roi is simple. My friendship with her is... was simple. From dawn till dusk, the days are predictable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As long as we went up to the Spacetrek Observatory at the time set by the Sky Projection Array, we'd always see the stars just as we expected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Turns out she got tired of the stars here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's strange. When I stargazed with her, I could always find something new in their constant, steady orbits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I guess I'm the only one who wants to keep staring at the same, unchanging night sky.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Sorry. I need some time alone. Thank you for helping.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? She wants to stay out in the frostlands a while longer to guide other teams...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see… Hah, she must've found something new that caught her eye!

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's just how Sanna is. She always forgets everything else when she's interested in something.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But she promised me. We made a promise to stargaze together at the Spacetrek Observatory. So she'll come back eventually.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll wait for her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know I'll see her again one day, and that's something I'll look forward to...

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like the unchanging stars I look forward to seeing glide across Lahai-Roi's night sky...

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Both make me feel very happy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for asking around for me. I feel much better now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Harriet
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What will the stars look like tomorrow?
